briefTitle: Epidemiology of TNBC in Asyut Clinical Oncology Department
officialTitle: Epidemiology of Triple Negative Breast Cancer in Asyut Clinical Oncology Department From 2015 to 2022 ( A Hospital Based Study)
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:- Age ≥ 18

* Male or female
* Diagnosed as TNBC from ( 2015- 2022 ) confirmed by pathology
* Adjuvant or metastatic

Exclusion Criteria:- Have other type of malignancy

* HER2 , ER, PR positive
